text:
As we know, the red cross is an association with the goal of doing some first aid on needed people. This community appeared on 1864 and was created by Alex Dupont. This man had the idea of creating this type of association thanks to a war. In fact, he was on the battleground and saw a man in distress so he decided to help him. He wanted on a church and started to give some first aids. He was joined by some women and nurses.
Nowadays the Red Cross Association count a lot of volunteers, and, thanks to their humanity, they help a lot of people by feeding, caring or accommodate them. Whereas it was first an association to heal the soldier, with the time it grew up and has spread to multiple missions as we saw just before.
Moreover, a lot of different people can work and participate on the Red Cross. Indeed, with the enlargement of the association, you can do a nurse, a social worker, a doctor, a nursery etc.
To sum up, the Red cross is a really great association.
 I think the Red Cross association is a great idea and innovation. In fact it help some people when they are in need. You can be a volunteers when you want and see what's beeing in the need is.
